## Code Quality Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are checked before requesting review -->

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Backend Checklist (if applicable)

- [ ] `flake8 backend/` passes with no errors
- [ ] `black backend/ --check` passes
- [ ] `mypy backend/` passes with no type errors
- [ ] `pytest` passes all tests
- [ ] Code coverage maintained or improved

## Frontend Checklist (if applicable)

- [ ] `npm run lint` passes with no errors
- [ ] `npm run type-check` passes
- [ ] `npm test` passes all tests
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No console errors in browser

## Architecture Principles

<!-- Confirm adherence to project principles -->

- [ ] Anonymous-first: Features work without requiring identity
- [ ] Capability over credentials: Focus on skills/abilities, not titles/degrees
- [ ] Human-in-the-loop: AI decisions queued for human review
- [ ] State recovery: Changes create checkpoints for rollback
